description: IACS DevOps Labs and Experiments - A comprehensive web application for industrial automation engineers featuring protocol labs, technical blogs, and learning resources with authenticated user access.

tasks.title: Bootstrap PRD tracking artifacts
tasks.description: Create PRD.json and progress.txt to enforce development tracking methodology.
tasks.validation: PRD.json and progress.txt exist in repo root.

tasks.title: Set up PostgreSQL database with user schemas
tasks.description: Create database schemas for users, sessions, and lab progress tracking using Drizzle ORM.
tasks.validation: Database tables created and migrations applied successfully.

tasks.title: Add Replit Auth integration
tasks.description: Implement Replit Auth for Google, GitHub, Apple, X and email login with secure credential storage.
tasks.validation: Users can sign in via multiple providers and sessions persist correctly.

tasks.title: Transform platform branding to IACS DevOps Labs and Experiments
tasks.description: Update hero section, navigation, and branding to reflect the new IACS DevOps Labs and Experiments identity.
tasks.validation: Header shows new branding; hero section describes platform capabilities.

tasks.title: Redesign main page with dashboard sections
tasks.description: Create dashboard layout with Protocol Labs section and expansion placeholders for future features.
tasks.validation: Homepage displays organized sections for labs, learning resources, and future areas.

tasks.title: Redesign About page
tasks.description: Create professional About page with proper sections, author bio, and social links.
tasks.validation: About page has clean layout with structured content sections.

tasks.title: Configure lab backend environment variables
tasks.description: Set up environment variables for external lab backend integration (LAB_API_BASE, LAB_GUEST_URL, LAB_ADMIN_URL, LAB_DIAG_URL).
tasks.validation: Environment variables configured and accessible in application.

tasks.title: Implement lab control API client
tasks.description: Create API client to communicate with external Docker backend for lab switching (/api/switch, /api/status).
tasks.validation: Frontend can call lab API and display status updates.

tasks.title: Add guest vs authenticated user access control
tasks.description: Implement access control: Modbus for guests, all protocols for authenticated users.
tasks.validation: Guest users see only Modbus; authenticated users can access all protocols.

tasks.title: Rewrite blog content
tasks.description: Rewrite blog content to sound natural and engineer-focused, removing AI-generated patterns.
tasks.validation: Blog posts read naturally with technical depth appropriate for engineers.

tasks.title: Implement cybersecurity best practices
tasks.description: Add CSRF protection, rate limiting, input validation, and secure headers.
tasks.validation: Security headers present; rate limiting active; inputs validated.

tasks.title: Create comprehensive test scenarios
tasks.description: Document and implement test scenarios for guest and user flows per QC checklist.
tasks.validation: Test document covers functional, security, and performance scenarios.

tasks.title: Final review and documentation update
tasks.description: Complete architect review and update replit.md with new platform documentation.
tasks.validation: replit.md reflects current architecture and all features documented.
